term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - continuous-flow cell in spectrochemical analysis
term.title: continuous-flow cell

item.text: A cell which allows liquid (or gaseous) samples to pass through the cell continuously while absorption measurements are made.

sources.item: PAC, 1988, 60, 1449. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis - VII. Molecular absorption spectroscopy, ultraviolet and visible (UV/VIS) (Recommendations 1988)' on page 1454 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198860091449)
